thread.title: Target: February Beauty Box Only $7 Shipped ($38 Value)
thread.title_full: Target: February Beauty Box Only $7 Shipped ($38 Value)

author: Jessica
title: Target: February Beauty Box Only $7 Shipped ($38 Value)
text:
The February Beauty Box is available, but won’t last long! Hurry over to Target.com where they dropped the price of this Target February Beauty Box to just $7 (regularly $10) plus free shipping – limit 1 per person. This beauty box is valued at $38!
Even better, if you’re a Target REDCardholder , you will get an additional 5% off your entire purchase, making the final cost of this box just $6.65 shipped right to your doorstep!

Each beauty box includes 8 items: Masque Bar Hydrating Peel Off Mask, Raw Sugar Raw Coconut and Mango Body Wash, Soap and Glory Face Soap and Clarity Face Wash, Gliss Ultimate Repair Shampoo, Gliss Ultimate Repair Conditioner, Sun Bum Sunless Self-Tanning Towelette, W3LL PEOPLE Expressionist Pro Mascara, and L’Oréal Paris Pure-Clay Mask. 
(Thanks, Tracey!)
